name: PHPharo
tagline: PHPharo (PHP Pharaoh) is A Non-MVC Full Featured Framework That Makes You Create Any Type Of App(s) Even Sub-Apps
body:
> PHP Pharaoh is an oop modular non-mvc full featured framework that makes you create any app(s) with it

* Very Light
* Very Small
* Full Featured
* Modular
* Powerful Router (Say No To /class/method/parm1/parm2/param3...) but it's full customizable 
* Powerful Helpers
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
